title: Dangurava sAri
sahitya:
Dangurava sAri hariya Dingarigellaru bhU-maNDalakke pANDuranga viTTalane paradaivavendu


caraNam 1    oDala jAgaDeya mADi nuDiva nAligeya piDidu biDade ThaNa ThaNarendu baDidu cappaLikkutta
    caraNam 2   hariyu mADida huva hari vANadalli hottu koNDu haruSadindali hADi pADi kuNidu cappaLikkutta
    caraNam 3    intu sakala jagake lakSmIkAntanalladillavendu santatam bhajisuta nishcinta purandara viTTalanendu
